name: Instant Pot® Ground Turkey and Potato Soup
author: Rhonda Harp
summary: Ground turkey breast and potato soup in the Instant Pot®.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon steak seasoning, or to taste
4 cups chicken broth, or as needed
4 medium russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices
directions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®), add oil, and select Saute function
Cook bell pepper and onion in the hot oil until onion is translucent, 5 to 7 minutes
Add garlic, pepper, steak seasoning, and cumin; cook and stir until turkey has browned evenly and is no longer pink, 14 to 16 minutes
Pour 1/4 cup chicken broth into the pan and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon
Add remaining chicken broth until potatoes are just covered
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 6 minutes
Allow 5 to 10 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes
Select Saute function and bring to a boil
Pour in heavy cream, stirring as you add it
Add slaw and cook for 2 minutes
Turn off the cooker and let sit until slaw is tender, about 5 minutes
